name: Chloe
text:
Chloe
"You know that zebra's out again?"
Chloe was a resident of Twin Peaks, Washington.
At the Roadhouse one night, Chloe joined her friend Ella in a booth, remarking that "that zebra" was out again. They talked about Ella's firing and new job, then both girls laughed at Ella's joke about a penguin.
